thread.title_full: Pear Vodka is the Perfect Backdrop in this...

title: Pear Vodka is the Perfect Backdrop in this...
text:
Distilled Spirits Updated August 02, 2016 . 
This is one of the most interesting pumpkin-flavored martinis yet. In the Pumpkin Divine a little bit of pear is mixed with lush pumpkin butter and the seasonings of cinnamon , clove, nutmeg and apple finish off the fall flavors in a fantastic splash. I’ve tried it with a variety of pear-infused vodkas and Grey Goose’s subtlety in the flavor is a great match.
